name: Nosferatu
description: Ancient, monstrous vampires warped by centuries of darkness. They wield terrifying blood magic and can transform into bat form.

abilities.name: Blood Bolt
abilities.description: Fires a bolt of coagulated blood that deals damage and slows the target.

abilities.name: Blood Drain
abilities.description: Channels to drain life from target, healing self for damage dealt.

abilities.name: Bat Form
abilities.description: Transform into a bat, gaining flight and increased speed but reduced damage.
